name: Running Ben
description:
Lost in a forest, you try to look for a way out...
You come across a strange-looking yellow 90s styled telephone.
It starts to RING...

You answer the phone - the rest is history.

Update 1.2.1- 
-Fixed game brightness
-Fixed Collisions
-Polished the levels
-Fixed Flashlight
-Added speedrun timer
-Added pause menu (doesn't pause the game)
-Added extra game sounds
-Added LINUX and MAC  builds
